0.text:
Throughout my life, I've been inspired by
the courage, success and determination of

5.text: so many women - friends, family and colleagues.

9.text:
International Women's Day is a chance for
all of us to shout loudly and together in

15.text:
support of greater equality, wherever it's
needed.

19.text:
And, since 2010, the Coalition has been focused
on making Britain a fairer society: where

24.text:
everyone - no matter what their gender, background
or circumstances, can succeed.

29.text:
This includes introducing shared parental
leave.

32.text:
So, from April next year, mothers who want
to return to work early after having a baby

36.text:
can and  their partners will be  able to
use their remaining leave and pay.

41.text:
We're improving access to affordable, high-quality
childcare to help those families most feeling

49.text:
We're also changing the pension system so
that it is fairer for women, and have introduced

54.text:
a tax cut that's helping put money back in
the pockets of millions of women.

58.text:
In addition, we're working to get more women
into the boardroom, and encouraging all those

63.text:
female entrepreneurs with a good idea to start
their own companies.

68.text:
More widely, we are working across the world
to ensure more women and girls have greater

73.text: choice and control over their own lives.

76.text:
We're helping to get more young girls into
school, fighting to banish horrific practices

82.text:
such as female genital mutilation and working
to improve women's access to justice.

87.text:
I'm determined to keep going further - both
in my own party and in Government.

94.text:
That's my commitment for this International
Women's Day and beyond.

98.text:
Together, we can make a difference - locally,
nationally and globally - ensuring everyone

104.text:
has an equal shot at the happy, healthy and
successful life they want.
